headline: Savor the Authenticity
homeTextHistory: Nestled in the picturesque Tolerud region lies Nordre Tolerud Farm
homeTextProducts: Come experience the timeless beauty of our farm and taste the quality of our locally-sourced products
productCardTitle: Our commitment to locally grown and freshly cooked meals guarantees exceptional dishes.
about-text-1: Chef Ingvar: Passionate about crafting delightful dishes using fresh local ingredients. Combining taste and presentation for an unmatched culinary experience.

capreseCrostini.name: Caprese Crostini
capreseCrostini.description: Crispy crostini topped with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil. Finished with a balsamic drizzle for an Italian touch.
capreseCrostini.altText: Crostini with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, and a hint of balsamic.

lasagna.name: Lasagna
lasagna.description: Tender pasta layered with meat sauce, b√©chamel, and cheeses. Timeless Italian indulgence.
lasagna.altText: Lasagna being served onto a plate

spaghettiAglioOlio.name: Spaghetti Aglio Olio
spaghettiAglioOlio.description: Spaghetti with garlic, olive oil, and red pepper. An authentic Italian flavor celebration.
spaghettiAglioOlio.altText: Simple spaghetti Aglio Olio on a grey ceramic plate

bruschetta.name: Bruschetta
bruschetta.description: Crisp bread with tomatoes, basil, and olive oil. A burst of Mediterranean delight.
bruschetta.altText: Several bruschetta being served on a wooden chopping board

wholemealWaffles.name: Wholemeal Waffles
wholemealWaffles.description: Hearty waffles ready for toppings. A balance of indulgence and nourishment.
wholemealWaffles.altText: Maple syrup drizzled onto brown wholemeal waffles with blueberries

grapefruitOasis.name: Grapefruit Oasis
grapefruitOasis.description: Fresh juice and spirits, tart and sweet. A refreshing grapefruit-infused escape.
grapefruitOasis.altText: Generous slice of Grapefruit served with a cocktail drink

amarettiCharlotte.name: Amaretti Charlotte
amarettiCharlotte.description: Cream-filled pastry topped with amaretti. A blend of delightful textures and flavors.
amarettiCharlotte.altText: Amaretti Charlotte served on an oval ceramic plate

searedScallops.name: Seared Scallops
searedScallops.description: Scallops in herb butter, with a crisp exterior. A hint of exotic flavors.
searedScallops.altText: Bite sized scallops appetizers served on a wooden board.

brownieIceCream.name: Brownie Ice Cream
brownieIceCream.description: Fudgy brownies paired with smooth ice cream. A symphony of sweetness and texture.
brownieIceCream.altText: Brownie with a vanilla ice cream on top.

greenSalad.name: Green Salad
greenSalad.description: Fresh lettuce, cucumbers, and spinach in a light vinaigrette. A crisp companion to any meal.
greenSalad.altText: A vibrant bowl of Green Salad with assorted fresh vegetables and a light vinaigrette.

baconCheeseBurger.name: Bacon Cheese Burger
baconCheeseBurger.description: Juicy beef patty, crispy bacon, and melted cheese in toasted buns. A flavor-packed delight.
baconCheeseBurger.altText: A succulent bacon cheeseburger with crispy bacon, melty cheese, fresh vegetables, and creamy condiments between toasted buns.

berryBlissPudding.name: Berry Bliss Pudding
berryBlissPudding.description: Assorted berries in a velvety base. A balanced dance of tart and sweet flavors.
berryBlissPudding.altText: Berry Bliss Pudding with assorted berries in a balanced tart and sweet flavor profile

savorySalmonToast.name: Savory Salmon Toast
savorySalmonToast.description: Smoked salmon on crisp toast with herb spread. A fusion of textures and rich flavors.
savorySalmonToast.altText: Savory Salmon Toast featuring crispy toast topped with flavorful smoked salmon and fresh herbs.

verdePestoParadiso.name: Verde Pesto Paradiso
verdePestoParadiso.description: Basil, pine nuts, and Parmesan with al dente pasta. An Italian classic with a zesty twist.
verdePestoParadiso.altText: Al dente pasta with green pesto, garnished with Parmesan, lemon zest, basil leaves, and pine nuts.

rivieraRatatouille.name: Riviera Ratatouille
rivieraRatatouille.description: Roasted vegetables with herbs de Provence. Capturing the sunny essence of Provence.
rivieraRatatouille.altText: Vibrant roasted vegetables in rich tomato sauce and herbs, representing classic Ratatouille.

quintessentialQuiche.name: Quintessential Quiche
quintessentialQuiche.description: Creamy eggs, cheese, and veggies in a buttery crust. A brunch classic blending flavors and textures.
quintessentialQuiche.altText: A golden-brown quiche with a creamy filling and flaky crust, garnished with fresh herbs.

berryMist.name: Berry Mist
berryMist.description: Blackberries and mint topped with velvety foam. A cocktail that's a sensory treat.
berryMist.altText: Berry Mist cocktail with blackberry-mint base and textured white foam, offering varied flavors.

name: Name
